resources.string: Allows you to keep Battery Saver enabled
Any changes you make will not be saved
Master switch to enable/disable all module functions.
Prevent Disabling on Plugged In event
Stops the system from automatically turning off Battery Saver when the device is plugged in.
Prevents disabling the Battery Saver if it is now charging.
Hide Charging Status from Battery Saver
Prevents the system from telling Battery Saver that the device is charging.
Aggressively block *any* change (manual or automatic) to the Battery Saver status. Use with caution!
Enabling this option attempts to block all system changes to Battery Saver. This might cause unexpected behavior or conflicts. Use cautiously.
